meanings.sent1: I poured some applesauces over my pancakes.
meanings.sent2: The applesauces added a delicious flavor to the pork chops.
meanings.sent3: The applesauces decided to have a dance party in the fridge.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter bubbled like a pot of simmering applesauces.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of the applesauces filled the kitchen with warmth.

meanings.definition: A sweetened sauce made from cooked apples.
meanings.sent1: The dessert was topped with a drizzle of sweet applesauces.
meanings.sent2: Grandma's pies always had a dollop of homemade applesauces.
meanings.sent3: The applesauces whispered secrets to the cinnamon sticks.
meanings.sent4: His smile was as sweet as a spoonful of applesauces.
meanings.sent5: The children licked their lips in anticipation of the sugary applesauces.
